Köszönjük, hogy érdeklődsz a GWENT: Zsivány Mágus iránt! These are the legal rules (we’ll call them “Rules”) which we ask you to follow if you download, install or play the game.\n\nWe’ve also included some informal short summaries of each of these Rules (although remember that it’s the full version which is legally binding).\n\n1. ABOUT THESE RULES\nThese Rules are a legally binding contract between you and CD PROJEKT S.A, with its seat at ul. Jagiellonska 74; 03-301, Warsaw, Poland (we will further call ourselves “CD PROJEKT RED” as CD PROJEKT S.A. is the legal entity CD PROJEKT RED is part of) regarding your use of GWENT: Rogue Mage. IMPORTANT: please also read our CD PROJEKT RED User Agreement which sets out the basic legal rules for most of our games and services, including this game. Our Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use and protect any personal information gathered from users. These Rules also supplement any terms and conditions of any digital distribution platforms, which you might use to download and play GWENT: Rogue Mage.\n\nThis is a legal agreement between you, dear gamer, and us, i.e. CD PROJEKT RED, regarding GWENT: Rogue Mage. There is also another document called CD PROJEKT RED User Agreement that sets out the rules for our games and services. These rules will also apply to your use of GWENT: Rogue Mage, so please read them as well!\n\n2. WHAT YOU GET WITH THE GAME\nWe (meaning CD PROJEKT RED) give you the personal right (called a 'licence' legally) to download, install and play GWENT: Rogue Mage on your personal device as long as you follow these Rules. This licence is for your personal use only (so you can't give a sublicense to someone else) and doesn't give you ownership rights.\nAt all times we continue to own the entirety of GWENT: Rogue Mage, all in-game content, any updates or additional content for them, manuals or other materials about them and the intellectual property rights in them, including all copyright, trademarks, patents and legal things like that (all of this together we call the ‘Game’).\n\nWe grant you the right to play GWENT: Rogue Mage and we sincerely hope you will enjoy it. We spent quite some time developing this game, so let us add that it is our creation and remains our ownership. This will not limit you in having fun with it, will it? ;)\n\n3. WHAT YOU CAN'T DO WITH THE GAME\nPlease act reasonably and don’t do anything with the Game that is against the law, these Rules or CD PROJEKT RED User Agreement. A general list of what you should not do with any of our games and services may be found in the CD PROJEKT RED User Agreement.\n\nThere are some things that we are not okay with, though, such as decompiling the game – you will find more examples of things you should not do in our CD PROJEKT RED User Agreement.\n\n4. WHAT CONTENT YOU CAN CREATE\nPlease refer to our Fan Content Guidelines for information on when/how you can make community-generated content connected with the Game (e.g. fan art, websites, videos/streams/Let’s Plays, mods etc.) and how we treat such content when it comes to ownership and licensing.\n\nOur community is known for creating wonderful content inspired by our games, so we came up with Fan Content Guidelines to help show what’s OK and what isn’t in this regard. Spoiler alert- Let’s Plays and streams of GWENT: Rogue Mage are totally fine and yes, you can monetize them!\n\n5. OTHER LEGAL STUFF\nAs you see, this is a short document and we may amend these Rules over time. If so, we'll post an updated version up and make reasonable efforts to notify you, where possible. Once we change these Rules, it will become legally binding on you 30 days after we post it online. Please also remember that these Rules are supplemented by CD PROJEKT RED User Agreement (https://regulations.cdprojektred.com/user_agreement).\n\nThese Rules are here for a reason. As a result, if you break any of them or CD PROJEKT RED User Agreement, we reserve the right to cancel or suspend your access to the Game.\n\nWe are not huge fans of rules but if you go against those, you may lose access to GWENT: Rogue Mage (temporarily or permanently). We are sure that nothing bad will happen, but the legal folks said this point has to be made here. Last thing- we may update this document in the future, but in such case we will post an updated version.\n\n6. cd_projekt_eula_message;CD PROJEKT RED felhasználói megállapodás\nLast updated: 20 July 2022\n\nHello! We are CD PROJEKT RED, part of the CD PROJEKT SA group, and we make games, including The Witcher series and Cyberpunk 2077. We've put a lot of work into building CD PROJEKT RED and as a result we need to have some rules about what you can and can't do with our games and services. We've put this Agreement together as simply as we legally can, with some informal short summaries to help you understand what it means. However, the full text wording is what is important/binding legally.\n\nQUICK SUMMARY\n1. \nThis agreement explains what the CD PROJEKT RED games and services are and how you can use them. We’ve included here a short, informal summary of these rules to make it easier for you. However it is the full version below which is legally binding.\nThis Agreement covers most of our games and services, but some have their own specific rules (e.g. Gwent and Cyberpunk 2077).\nPlease make sure you’ve also read our Fan Content Guidelines and CD PROJEKT RED Privacy Policy (links below).\nCheck the age rating of a CD PROJEKT RED game before you start playing. If you are not yet 18 years old, you need parental/guardian approval, even if game is rated as suitable for minors. We know it sounds kind of silly – no, it is not our own invention, but actually a legal requirement.\n\n2.\nYou have the personal right to use CD PROJEKT RED games and services.\nIf you or a member of your household have an epileptic condition, please check with your doctor before using the CD PROJEKT RED games and services!\n\n3.\nWe may offer beta access to new games or services. Beta versions aren't complete and we're not responsible for what happens while you're using them. Fear not, they should not blow up your computer!\n\n4.\nSome CD PROJEKT RED games and services might offer you integration with GOG Galaxy. That’s totally optional and up to you. GOG.COM is our sister company, so you are in good hands of on-line specialists.\n\n5. \nOur games and services will have clearly specified minimum system requirements, which are needed in order to run our games and services.\n\n6.\nFrom time to time we may need to patch, update or change how CD PROJEKT RED games and services work.\n\n7.\nWe spent years building CD PROJEKT RED and our games/services. Enjoy it all, but please behave and do not cause trouble.\n\n8.\nCD PROJEKT RED games and services are here for your personal enjoyment – please use them for this purpose only and make sure you follow the rules below! \n\n9.\nPlease check the full Fan Content Guidelines for further information about how you can make fan content of our games and services.\n\n10. \nIt’s cool to send us feedback and suggestions about CD PROJEKT RED games and services. Thank you! However please don’t be disappointed if we don’t use them or reward you for them. This does not mean we do not appreciate it.\nYou can send us optional crash reports.\n\n11.\nYou click on a link taking you outside of our little kingdom = we cannot look after you anymore.\n\n12. \nWe make legally binding promises (called 'warranties') about CD PROJEKT RED games and services, for example that we will take reasonable care regarding your use of them. We also explain a bit further how we are responsible legally for CD PROJEKT RED games and services.\n\n13. \nIf you want to end this Agreement, then unfortunately you will need to stop playing/accessing our games and services.\nIf you seriously breach this Agreement you may lose access to CD PROJEKT RED games and services (temporarily or permanently).\nIf in the very unlikely situation we have to stop running any CD PROJEKT RED games and services, we'll try to give you advance notice.\n\n14. \nIf unforeseen events beyond your or our control occur (war, earthquake, gigantic flood, alien attack, Godzilla, etc.- ok the last two are jokes), then neither of us will be liable to the other for any obligations, which can't be performed.\n\n15.\nAny legal questions/complaints/ claims regarding this Agreement are under Polish law and jurisdiction for users all around the world except users resident in the USA, who are under California law and jurisdiction.\n\n16.\nThis section sets out a few additional, hopefully self-explanatory rules about how this Agreement works legally. \nThis Agreement and our Privacy Policy together are a contract between you and us.\nThis Agreement is just between you and us.\nWe might be required to comply with law enforcement requests.\nWe can transfer this Agreement if we need to for business reasons.\nEven if we delay using a right under this Agreement, it doesn’t mean we won’t use it.\n\n17.\nWe can change this Agreement but if we do we'll put the changed version online and normally it will take effect a reasonable time period afterwards.\nIf you have any questions with regards to the changes, you may contact us at legal@cdprojektred.com.\nIf you don’t agree with the changes, then sadly you will need to stop using the CD PROJEKT RED games and services.
cd_projekt_eula_message_2;FULL TEXT\n1. ABOUT THIS AGREEMENT\n1.1 This Agreement. This Agreement is a legally binding contract between you and CD PROJEKT S.A., seated at ul. Jagiellonska 74; 03-301, Warsaw, Poland.\nJust so you know, CD PROJEKT RED is the name of the game development studio within CD PROJEKT S.A., so we will refer to ourselves throughout this Agreement as "CD PROJEKT RED", "we" or "us".\nThis Agreement applies to cyberpunk.net, thewitcher.com, cdprojektred.com, any other CD PROJEKT RED websites, any and all CD PROJEKT RED games (except those specifically mentioned below) including The Witcher, The Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings, The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt, The Witcher Battle Arena or The Witcher Adventure Game, CD PROJEKT RED forums, wikis, blogs, social media accounts, CD PROJEKT RED accounts, CD PROJEKT RED customer and technical support and any other services we provide to you (we'll call all this "CD PROJEKT RED games and services" for short).\nThis Agreement does not apply to Gwent or Cyberpunk 2077, which each have their own legal documents.\nIt is binding on you and us once you use any CD PROJEKT RED games and services. If you do not agree to it, you are not permitted to use the CD PROJEKT RED games and services. \nImportant: please also make sure you read our: (a) game/service specific rules (e.g. the Witcher 3 EULA)- which explain in more detail the legal rules for specific games or services; and (b) CD PROJEKT RED Privacy Policy- which details CD PROJEKT RED’s collection, usage and protection of your personal information. Our Fan Content Guidelines explain what you can and cannot do with fan content about our games and services. All of these documents form part of this Agreement and we may update them from time to time. You may also need to agree and follow terms and conditions of any digital distribution platforms which you use to access and play CD PROJEKT RED games and services, such as our awesome sister company GOG.\nOur modding tools for The Witcher, and REDKit for The Witcher 2: Assassins of Kings, are covered by their existing legal documents. \n1.2. Age Restrictions. Every CD PROJEKT RED videogame has its own age rating (e.g. PEGI, ESRB) which may differ depending on where you are located and will be displayed when you purchase the game. You should only play our games if you meet the applicable minimum age rating. If you are above the applicable minimum age rating and you are over 18 (or whatever is the age of adulthood in your country) then please enjoy our games. If you are under 18 (or whatever is the age of adulthood in your country) – before we extend an equally warm welcome, please ask your parent or guardian to review and approve this Agreement on your behalf (because in some countries people under a certain age cannot legally enter fully into contracts like this Agreement), plus they should supervise your use of the games, even if the age rating for a given game is lower than 18 year. \n1.3 Content Warning. Some CD PROJEKT RED games and services contain scenes and images of violence, sexuality, and drug use that some may find disturbing. If you are sensitive to such content or such content is a trigger for you, please be aware of this before you begin playing the game.\n\n2. USING CD PROJEKT RED GAMES AND SERVICES\n2.1 Licence. We give you the personal, limited, revocable, non-exclusive, non-transferable and non-assignable licence to display, view, download, install, play and use CD PROJEKT RED games and services on your personal computer, games consoles and/or other devices/platforms that are explicitly authorised by CD PROJEKT RED (which are listed separately for each game on their respective websites).This licence is for your personal use only (so you can't give, ‘sell’, lend, gift, assign, sub-license or otherwise transfer it to someone else) and doesn't give you ownership rights in the CD PROJEKT RED games and services.\n2.2 Seizure Warning. Some CD PROJEKT RED games and services may contain flashing lights and images, which may induce epileptic seizures. If you or anyone in your household has an epileptic condition, please consult your doctor before using the CD PROJEKT RED games and services. If you experience dizziness, altered vision, eye or muscle twitches, loss of awareness, disorientation, any involuntary movement, or convulsions while playing, immediately discontinue use and consult your doctor.\n3. CD PROJEKT RED BETA ACCESS\n3.1 We may release 'beta' versions of CD PROJEKT RED games and services before their full commercial release. If so:\n- your access to the beta will usually be time-limited and there may be some additional contract terms;\n- you will probably be asked to participate in a feedback process in which you can offer information about how the beta works; \n- the beta software will be provided 'as is' without any additional promises from us or any liability on us if the software isn't complete or doesn't work fully or causes issues. After all, that's the point of us giving you beta access: you get beta access to something new, but you recognise that it won't be complete yet; and\n- the game or service may have specific legal rules of its own for its beta, so check them out.\n\n4. GOG GALAXY ACCOUNTS\n4.1 GOG Galaxy. Some of our games or services may involve optional use of GOG Galaxy, an online service being created by our sister company GOG.com. Using GOG Galaxy may offer you certain benefits that wouldn’t otherwise be available to you, but it will always be totally optional, DRM-free (no copy-protection, on-line checks or authentications) and up to you.\n4.2 Additional T&Cs. If you do decide to use GOG Galaxy, your use of it will be governed by GOG Galaxy legal T&Cs, which we encourage you to read before you start using their service. GOG.com will be responsible for your use of GOG Galaxy and we’re sure they can help you out with any issues or queries.\n\n5. SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS\n5.1 Minimum Requirements. Each CD PROJEKT RED game and service will have minimum requirements depending on your chosen device/system/platform (e.g. on our game store pages). Please make sure your system meets these requirements (particularly before buying any games)! Online elements of our games or services may need Internet access too. We do not include any DRM in our games ourselves, but some console/device manufacturers use security technology which is outside of our control. \n\n6. PATCHES, UPDATES AND CHANGES\n6.1 Occasionally we may need to patch or update CD PROJEKT RED games and services (for example to add or remove features, to resolve software bugs or to balance our games). This may result in mandatory and/or automatic updates and older, non-updated versions may become unusable over time. We need these rights in order to keep our games and services running efficiently.\n\n7. OWNERSHIP AND INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY RIGHTS\n7.1 Ownership. CD PROJEKT RED games and services, including (but not limited to) their visual components, characters, storylines, artwork, animations, designs, items, music and sound effects, dialogue, graphics, computer code, user interface, look and feel, game mechanics, gameplay, audio, video, text, layout, databases, data and all other content and all intellectual property rights and other legal and exploitation rights regarding them, are either owned by us or we license them from third parties. All rights in the CD PROJEKT RED games and services are reserved except as we have explained in this Agreement. You may not use or exploit any part of CD PROJEKT RED games and services except as explained in this Agreement and our Fan Content Guidelines. The CD PROJEKT RED games and services and their intellectual property rights are protected by copyright, trademark and other intellectual property laws worldwide. \n7.2 Third Party Property. CD PROJEKT RED respects the intellectual property rights of others. If you believe that your work has been infringed in or via the CD PROJEKT RED games and services, please contact us via legal@cdprojektred.com.\n\n8. WHAT YOU CAN'T DO WITH CD PROJEKT RED GAMES AND SERVICES\n8.1 Please follow these rules regarding CD PROJEKT RED games and services. If you’re interested in making Fan Content, you should also read the Fan Content Guidelines. Failure to follow the rules will be considered a ‘material breach’ of this Agreement, which could lead to suspension and/or termination of your access to the CD PROJEKT RED games and services. In particularly serious cases we retain the right to prohibit your future access to the CD PROJEKT RED games and services as well as our other games.\nHere are the rules:\n(a) Personal Enjoyment. Only use CD PROJEKT RED games and services for your personal enjoyment and not for any commercial purposes, unless explicitly permitted otherwise in our Fan Content Guidelines.\n(b) Applicable Law. You must comply with all applicable laws and regulations when using the CD PROJEKT RED games and services. \n(c) No Transfer. Do not attempt to copy, rent, buy, sell, lend, share, lease, sublicense, transfer, distribute, publish or publicly display the CD PROJEKT RED games and services or any of your rights under this Agreement in any way not expressly authorised under this Agreement. Also do not steal or misappropriate game keys/codes (all of which remain our property). If you are concerned that any of this has happened to you, contact https://support.cdprojektred.com/en/\n(d) Technical Misuse. We want you to be free to use your own CD PROJEKT RED content and back it up etc., but equally we need to have legal rules to protect against misuse. So (unless you have prior CD PROJEKT RED written permission) please don’t modify, merge, distribute, translate, reverse engineer, or attempt to obtain or use source code of, decompile or disassemble the CD PROJEKT RED games and services – unless you’re specifically allowed by this Agreement or applicable law.\n(e) Hacking and Cheating. Do not create, use, make available and/or distribute cheats. By cheats we mean things like exploits, automation software, robots, bots, hacks, spiders, spyware, scripts, trainers, extraction tools or other software that interact with or affect the CD PROJEKT RED games and services in any way (including any unauthorised third party programs that collect information about the CD PROJEKT RED games and services by reading areas of memory used by the CD PROJEKT RED games and services to store information).\n(f) CD PROJEKT RED Services. Do not deliberately or maliciously interrupt or interfere with CD PROJEKT RED services like customer or technical support or impersonate CD PROJEKT RED staff.\n(g) CD PROJEKT RED IT Systems. Don't deliberately or maliciously interfere with, disrupt or access restricted areas of CD PROJEKT RED or third party network software or servers, including via tunnelling, code injection or insertion, denial of service, modifying or changing the software, using any other similar software together with CD PROJEKT RED software, through protocol emulation, or through creation or use of private servers or any analogous services regarding CD PROJEKT RED games and services.\n(h) Data Mining. Do not intercept, mine or otherwise collect personal or confidential data or information from the CD PROJEKT RED games and services.\n(i) Names. Do not use ‘CD PROJEKT RED’ or other CD PROJEKT RED group/game/services names or logos or trademarks for any unauthorised purposes.\n(j) Infringing Content. Do not do anything in connection with the CD PROJEKT RED games and services that infringes any copyright, trademark, patent, trade secret, privacy, publicity, or other rights.\n(k) Malicious Code. Do not upload any files that contain any malicious code, including viruses, spyware, Trojan horses, worms, time bombs, intentionally corrupted data, any other files that contain malicious code or that may in any way damage or interfere with the operation of the CD PROJEKT RED games and services.\n(l) Geographic Restrictions. We ask you to follow any applicable geographic or regional, language or location-based restrictions, requirements or rules regarding the CD PROJEKT RED games and services.\n(m) Be nice! Don't do or say anything or use the CD PROJEKT RED games and services in any way that is or may be considered racist, harassing, xenophobic, sexist, discriminatory, abusive, defamatory or otherwise offensive or illegal. Be nice to each other, please!\n(n) Additional Rules. Remember, some of our games have their own legal rules which supplement this Agreement- check them to find out more about what you should not do with a given game or service.\n\n9. FAN CONTENT\n9.1 Please refer to our Fan Content Guidelines for information on when/how you can make community-generated content for the CD PROJEKT RED games and services (e.g. fan art, websites, videos/streams/Let’s Plays, mods etc.) and how we treat such content when it comes to ownership and licensing.\n\n10. FEEDBACK AND CRASH REPORTS\n10.1 Feedback. We love community feedback and suggestions, so if you want to share your experience just contact the support team at: https://support.cdprojektred.com/. Please remember that CD PROJEKT RED does not have to use or accept them, we cannot accept any responsibility or liability for them and, if we do somehow incorporate a suggestion or something similar to it into or around the CD PROJEKT RED games and services, we won’t owe you anything (financially or otherwise) regarding them.\n10.2 Crash Reports. If something goes wrong with the CD PROJEKT RED games and services, we may ask you to send a crash log report in order to improve the game code for future use. These reports are optional and may include some personal data (for more information, please see our Privacy Policy).\n\n11. THIRD PARTY CONTENT AND EXTERNAL SERVICES\n11.1 You might get links from us to third party websites or content through CD PROJEKT RED games and services. You may also access the CD PROJEKT RED games and services through different devices/systems/platforms (which may also be subject to their own legal terms which you should read before using them). Using them is up to you – we can't promise they will work, what they will be like or if they are free.\n\n12. WARRANTIES AND LIABILITY REGARDING CD PROJEKT RED GAMES AND SERVICES\n12.1 Our Warranties. We warrant that: (i) we have the right to enter into this Agreement and to grant you the licence to use CD PROJEKT RED games and services in section 2.1; (ii) we will take reasonable care with the CD PROJEKT RED games and services and your use of them and (iii) we will use reasonable endeavours to comply with applicable laws in performing our obligations to you under this Agreement.\n12.2 Liability. We work hard to try to make CD PROJEKT RED games and services work on your systems but we only have limited time to carry out tests and we don't always get everything right. Therefore, we can’t accept any liability or responsibility if CD PROJEKT RED games and services do not work fully or completely. Also, we are not responsible or liable for anything that happens to CD PROJEKT RED games and services, which is outside of our reasonable control.\n\n13. TERMINATION\n13.1 Your Termination Rights. You can terminate this Agreement by permanently stopping use of the CD PROJEKT RED games and services at any time. Termination will not affect already existing rights or obligations to us or you.\n13.2 Our Termination Rights. We may cancel or suspend your access to CD PROJEKT RED games and services if you materially breach this Agreement, which includes a breach which is serious and/or which could cause real harm to the CD PROJEKT RED games and services, its users, CD PROJEKT RED and its affiliates, licensors and partners. In particular, it applies to the rules we specify in section 8 above. We will try where reasonably possible to contact you to explain why we have done this and what (if anything) you can do as a result. If we suspend or cancel your access to the CD PROJEKT RED games and services and this Agreement under this section, then we will not have any obligations or liabilities to you at all. \n13.3 Stopping the CD PROJEKT RED games and services. It seems very unlikely, but if we have to stop providing access to any CD PROJEKT RED games and services (in whole or in part – e.g. on a particular platform) permanently and not because of any breach by you, we will try to give you at least one hundred and twenty (120) days advance notice by posting a note on our website. In this case, we will not have any future obligations or liabilities to you (this does not affect any pre-existing obligations or liabilities).\n\n14. FORCE MAJEURE\n14.1 Neither you nor we will be liable for any failure to perform any obligation under this Agreement or to provide access to CD PROJEKT RED games and services if that failure is caused by the happening of any unforeseen event beyond your or our reasonable control including without limitation, internet outages, communications outages, pandemics, fire, flood, war or act of God.\n\n15. GOVERNING LAW\n15.1 For users resident in the European Union and elsewhere in the world (but not the USA):\nYou and we agree that your use of CD PROJEKT RED games and services, and this Agreement, will be governed by and interpreted according to the laws of Poland and any dispute regarding it will be exclusively under the jurisdiction of the courts of Poland. In any legal claim under this Agreement, the side, which wins will be entitled to its legal fees and expenses.\nFor users resident in the USA:\nYou and we agree that your use of CD PROJEKT RED games and services, and this Agreement, will be deemed to be entered into in Los Angeles, California and governed by and interpreted according to the laws of the State of California, USA (and, if applicable, US Federal law). Any legal claim by you against CD PROJEKT RED will be made exclusively in state or federal court located in Los Angeles, California, which will have subject matter jurisdiction regarding the dispute between you and us and therefore we both consent to the exclusive jurisdiction of those courts. In any legal claim under this Agreement, the side, who wins will be entitled to its legal fees and expenses.\n\n16. OTHER LEGAL STUFF\n16.1 Severability. If any part of this Agreement is found not to be legally enforceable, this will not affect any other part of it.\n16.2 Entire Agreement. This Agreement, together with the other documents referred to within it, constitutes the entire agreement between you and us regarding this Agreement and supersede any earlier oral or written agreements.\n16.3 No Third Parties. This Agreement governs our relationship with you (and vice versa). It does not create any rights for anyone else unless explicitly stated otherwise in this Agreement.\n16.4 Other Laws. Please remember that we are subject to various laws and we may be required to comply with law enforcement or other legal requirements, including import/export controls. You and we agree that the UN Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods does not apply to the CD PROJEKT RED games and services or this Agreement.\n16.5 Transfer. We can assign, subcontract or transfer this Agreement to a third party or another member of our group if necessary for the support of the CD PROJEKT RED games and services, as part of any reorganisation or merger or for other business reasons. We will notify you if this happens.\n16.6 Delay. No failure or delay by us or you to exercise any right or remedy provided under this Agreement or by law will constitute a waiver of that or any other right or remedy, nor will it preclude or restrict the further exercise of that or any other right or remedy, unless explicitly stated otherwise in this Agreement. No single or partial exercise of such right or remedy by us or you will preclude or restrict the further exercise of that or any other right or remedy.\n\n17. CHANGES TO THIS AGREEMENT\n17.1 Changes. We may change this Agreement if we think it’s necessary, e.g. for legal reasons or to reflect changes in CD PROJEKT RED games and services. If so, we will make the changed Agreement available online and make reasonable efforts to tell you about it (e.g. by sending you a notice in the relevant game).\n17.2 Binding Date. Once we change the Agreement, it will become legally binding on you 30 days after we post it online. During that period, you're welcome to contact us at legal@cdprojektred.com if you have specific questions about the changes.\n17.3 Disagreeing with Changes. If you don't agree to those changes (regardless of whether you email us), then unfortunately we must ask you to cease using CD PROJEKT RED games and services. We're sorry we have to say that, but we hope you'll appreciate that for CD PROJEKT RED games and services to work properly we need to have everyone using them under the same rules instead of different people having different rules. That's why we encourage you to get in contact if you have queries or concerns.\n\n18. APPLE iOS\nThe following terms apply only to users playing GWENT: Rogue Mage on iOS devices they own or control:\na) You acknowledge that this Agreement is concluded between you and CD PROJEKT RED, and not with Apple Inc., (“Apple”). To the maximum extent permitted by applicable law, Apple will have no other warranty obligation whatsoever with respect to GWENT: Rogue Mage, and any other claims, losses, liabilities, damages, costs or expenses attributable to any failure to conform to any warranty will be sole responsibility of CD PROJEKT RED. Please note, however, that to the extent permitted by law CD PROJEKT RED has disclaimed or limited warranties in accordance with provisions of Section 12 of CD PROJEKT RED User Agreement (https://regulations.cdprojektred.com/user_agreement) “Warranties and Liability Regarding CD PROJEKT RED Games and Services”, \ne) You acknowledge that CD PROJEKT RED, not Apple, is responsible for addressing your or any third party claims relating to GWENT: Rogue Mage or your possession and/or use of GWENT: Rogue Mage, including, but not limited to: (i) product liability claims; (ii) any claim that the GWENT: Rogue Mage fails to conform to any applicable legal or regulatory requirement; and (iii) claims arising under consumer protection, privacy, or similar legislation.\nf) You acknowledge that, in the event of any third party claim that GWENT: Rogue Mage or your possession and use of GWENT: Rogue Mage infringes that third that third party’s intellectual property rights, CD PROJEKT RED, not Apple, will be solely responsible for the investigation, defense, settlement and discharge of any such intellectual property claims.\ng) You acknowledge that (i) you are not located in a country that is subject to a U.S. Government embargo, or that has been designated by the U.S. Government as a “terrorist supporting” country; and (ii) you are not listed on any U.S. Government list of prohibited or restricted parties.\nh) You acknowledge and agree that Apple and Apple subsidiaries, are third party beneficiaries of this Agreement, and that, upon your acceptance of the terms and conditions of the Agreement, Apple will have the right (and will be deemed to have accepted the right) to enforce this Agreement against you as a third party beneficiary thereof.\nIf you play GWENT: Rogue Mage on iOS, your use of GWENT: Rogue Mage will be subject to additional terms and conditions.\nIn particular you confirm that Apple is not a party to this Agreement and is not responsible for GWENT: Rogue Mage, however, Apple is entitled to enforce this Agreement.\n\n19 ANDROID\nThe following terms apply only to users playing GWENT: Rogue Mage on Android devices they own or control:\na) You acknowledge that these Rules are concluded between you and CD PROJEKT RED, and not with Google LLC, Google Ireland Limited, Google Commerce Limited or Google Asia Pacific Pte. cd_projekt_eula_title;CD PROJEKT RED felhasználói megállapodás
challenge_faction_1;Északi Királyságok
challenge_faction_1_leader_1_desc;Radovid the Stern, Fifth of His Name, King of Redania, was a polarizing figure. Some considered him a brilliant strategist, a superb general. Others – a bloodthirsty, paranoid madman. The truth lay, as the truth is wont to do, somewhere in the middle.
challenge_faction_1_leader_1_match_1;Steel kinézet
challenge_faction_1_leader_1_match_1_desc;Radovid liked to say a soldier is only as strong as his breastplate. In the end, even the best swordsman cannot change the tides of battle if he falls to one stray arrow or a single lucky blow. That’s why Radovid never begrudged his infantry quartermasters the coin to buy solid armor.
challenge_faction_1_leader_1_match_1_strategy;Harald deals a lot of damage - boost your units so they don't get destroyed.
challenge_faction_1_leader_1_match_1_strategy_2;Radovid can help you take out Clan Axemen.
challenge_faction_1_leader_1_match_2;Strength in Numbers
challenge_faction_1_leader_1_match_2_desc;Human soldiers are neither as strong as dwarves nor as dexterous as elves. Yet they have one clear advantage over both elder races: their numbers. Gather a mass of humans, put swords in their hands and a half-decent commander in front… and there is no force that could hope to stop them.
challenge_faction_1_leader_1_match_2_strategy;Watch out for Francesca - she can draw any card she wants at any time.
challenge_faction_1_leader_1_match_2_strategy_2;Use Radovid to deal with resilient units like Mahakam Defenders.
challenge_faction_1_leader_1_match_3;Galloping Death
challenge_faction_1_leader_1_match_3_desc;Radovid is known for stating there is no problem a gallant charge of heavy cavalry cannot solve. Some doubt the truth of this declaration. Some clearly have not seen Redanian riders in action.
challenge_faction_1_leader_1_match_3_strategy;Dagon can spawn a Hazard at any time, so make sure you've got First Light.
challenge_faction_1_leader_1_match_3_strategy_2;Radovid can shut down Ancient Foglets and Barbegazis.
challenge_faction_1_leader_1_title;Radovid
challenge_faction_1_leader_2_desc;Henselt király stumbled ungainly on the dance floor and tripped over his tongue at courtly salons. On the battlefield, however, he moved as deftly as a fish in water. He knew all his infantrymen by name and could recite the range of each and every catapult to the inch.
challenge_faction_1_leader_2_match_1;Wooden Army
challenge_faction_1_leader_2_match_1_desc;Henselt adored his war machines. He would walk the ranks of his catapults like a proud father, tenderly stroking each ballista and trebuchet. He kept dozens and dozens of these contraptions in reserve – and built more any chance he got.
challenge_faction_1_leader_2_match_1_strategy;Watch out for Calveit - he can grab an extra card from his deck at any time.
challenge_faction_1_leader_2_match_1_strategy_2;Henselt can pull all copies of certain allies in your deck onto the board - use him to quickly gain a decisive lead.
challenge_faction_1_leader_2_match_2;Shoulder to Shoulder
challenge_faction_1_leader_2_match_2_desc;Henselt would often say two heads are better than one, and three – even better still. Thus he’d always order his troops to march into battle in threes, trios of soldiers fighting shoulder to shoulder. His generals were skeptical of this strategy… But changed their minds when they saw the results.
challenge_faction_1_leader_2_match_2_strategy;Bran can quickly fill his graveyard with units - watch out, because many Skellige abilities interact with the dead.
challenge_faction_1_leader_2_match_2_strategy_2;Henselt can pull all copies of certain allies in your deck onto the board - use him to quickly gain a decisive lead.
challenge_faction_1_leader_2_match_3;Kékszalagosok
challenge_faction_1_leader_2_match_3_desc;When Foltest király answered Henselt’s request for aid with twenty foot soldiers in striped uniforms, Henselt grew furious. What difference could they possibly make...? Well. As it turned out, an enormous one.
challenge_faction_1_leader_2_match_3_strategy;Watch out for Radovid - he'll try to take out any of your units that have powerful passive abilities.
challenge_faction_1_leader_2_match_3_strategy_2;Henselt can pull all copies of certain allies in your deck onto the board - use him to quickly gain a decisive lead.
challenge_faction_1_leader_2_title;Henselt
challenge_faction_2;Skellige
challenge_faction_2_leader_1_desc;As a warrior, Harald was thoroughly unremarkable. Then a bear mangled his leg and the bone healed back crooked. After that, each step caused him agonizing pain… and he fought better than ever before. He claimed the grit of constant suffering had honed an unstoppable edge.
challenge_faction_2_leader_1_match_1;Practiced in Pain
challenge_faction_2_leader_1_match_1_desc;Harald lived his entire life in excruciating pain, making him somewhat of an expert on the subject. This expertise extending to inflicting pain in others as well, to knowing where to strike to cause the greatest possible suffering, to evoke the most gut-wrenching screams. Soon, his foes would throw down their arms as soon as they heard his name.
challenge_faction_2_leader_1_match_1_strategy;Voorhis can reveal cards in your hand, gaining valuable information. Plus, many of his units benefit for every card revealed.
challenge_faction_2_leader_1_match_1_strategy_2;Harald can deal a lot of damage to your enemies - combine this with your units"abilities to defeat your opponent.
challenge_faction_2_leader_1_match_2;Battle Fury
challenge_faction_2_leader_1_match_2_desc;Cadets at Nilfgaard’s officer academy are drilled in the following rule: only strike a Skelliger if you’re confident your blow will kill. If you merely wound… you will quickly regret it.
challenge_faction_2_leader_1_match_2_strategy;Eithne and her units focus on using special cards. Destroy her units to stop this strategy in its tracks.
challenge_faction_2_leader_1_match_2_strategy_2;Harald can deal a lot of damage to your enemies - combine this with your units"abilities to defeat your opponent.
challenge_faction_2_leader_1_match_3;Bloodlust
challenge_faction_2_leader_1_match_3_desc;The backbone of Harald’s army consisted of axemen from Clan Tuirseach. These warriors thrived off bloodshed, growing faster, stronger and more resilient with every foe they slew. Harald’s opponents knew they needed either incapacitate the axemen at the start of the battle – or die by their hands.
challenge_faction_2_leader_1_match_3_strategy;The Láthatatlan Ős and his minions will try to steal your units"power. Boost your troops evenly to avoid giving them juicy targets.
challenge_faction_2_leader_1_match_3_strategy_2;Harald can deal a lot of damage to your enemies - combine this with your units"abilities to defeat your opponent.
challenge_faction_2_leader_1_title;Harald, a hadirokkant
challenge_faction_2_leader_2_desc;Azt mondják, a Skellige partjainak csapódó tenger hamarabb hajolna meg egy uralkodó előtt, mint a lakói. Mégis, meghajolnak Bran előtt. Egyesítette a szigetek összes klánját a lobogója alá, és erős marokkal tartotta össze őket a haláláig.
challenge_faction_2_leader_2_match_1;Iron Fleet
challenge_faction_2_leader_2_match_1_desc;When an army loses men, it should grow weaker. It is a simple dictate of logic. Yet Skellige routinely defies dictates, logic’s included. In fact, the fewer warriors Bran has in his charge, the more fiercely they fight. Thus when foes watch his ranks thin and their hearts begin rise… a Skellige axe cleaves them through moments later.
challenge_faction_2_leader_2_match_1_strategy;Brouver and his dwarves focus on boosting and Strengthening each other. Destroy his units to shut this strategy down.
challenge_faction_2_leader_2_match_1_strategy_2;Use Bran to send cards to the graveyard, then Resurrect them when the time is ripe.
challenge_faction_2_leader_2_match_2;Honor Guard
challenge_faction_2_leader_2_match_2_desc;To say Bran’s personal guard was loyal is like saying winter in the isles tends to be rather chilly, or its seas grow a bit choppy during storms. The Skellige maidens who served as his protectors defended their king fiercely, fighting through any injury short of death itself…and sometimes, through that as well.
challenge_faction_2_leader_2_match_2_strategy;The Arakász királynő tries to amass a mighty army. Try to disrupt this strategy or focus on building up your own strength.
challenge_faction_2_leader_2_match_2_strategy_2;Use Bran to send cards to the graveyard, then Resurrect them when the time is ripe.
challenge_faction_2_leader_2_match_3;Halhatatlan Islanders
challenge_faction_2_leader_2_match_3_desc;King Bran’s enemies would swear they crossed swords with warriors they had killed personally during earlier battles - not just once, but two times or more. Most think this foolish superstition, the wild tales of scarred soldiers, nothing more… But those who know Skellige well give such stories much credence. In the isles, death is not permanent.
challenge_faction_2_leader_2_match_3_strategy;Watch out for Henselt - he can bring many units onto the board in one move.
challenge_faction_2_leader_2_match_3_strategy_2;Use Bran to send cards to the graveyard, then Resurrect them when the time is ripe.

The queen of the dryads’ hatred for humans is absolute, brooking no exceptions. No matter how they plead, beg or threaten, she always gives them the same answer - an arrow to the head.
challenge_faction_4_leader_1_match_1;Defenders of Brokilon
challenge_faction_4_leader_1_match_1_desc;Brokilon is no common wood. This ancient entanglement of trees hums with magic, a primal energy pulsing from its soft breezes and burbling brooks. The dryads have learned draw on this, taking from it strength far beyond that of any man or elf.

faction_monsters_0_desc_text;<color=#ef7070><link=20005501>Fehér Fagy</link></color> allows you to move an opponent’s unit to the other row and apply <color=#ef7070><link=frost>Frost</link></color>, which will then damage the highest-power unit on that row by 2 for the next 2 turns. This can be particularly useful as a counter to enemy cards with abilities tied to a specific row.

faction_monsters_1_desc_text;Cards with <color=#ef7070><link=dominance>Dominance</link></color>, such as <color=#ef7070><link=13240200>Vad Hajsza Hound</link></color>, unlock their full potential when you control the highest-power unit on the battlefield. This highest-power unit can also be the card played, allowing you to play <color=#ef7070><link=13231000>Vad Hajsza Rider</link></color> on an empty board and benefit from its <color=#ef7070><link=dominance>Dominance</link></color>.
faction_monsters_2_desc_name;Frost
faction_monsters_2_desc_text;Applying <color=#ef7070><link=frost>Frost</link></color> with a card such as <color=#ef7070><link=20261200>Naglfar’s Crew</link></color> to a row that already has <color=#ef7070><link=frost>Frost</link></color> will increase the current effect’s duration. Remember to choose which row to apply <color=#ef7070><link=frost>Frost</link></color> to carefully as it can be critical to maintaining <color=#ef7070><link=dominance>Dominance</link></color> for your other cards.
faction_monsters_description;Lead the Vad Hajsza cavalcade and bring yet another world to its knees!
faction_neutral_name;Semleges
faction_nilfgaard_0_desc_name;Double Cross
faction_nilfgaard_0_desc_text;<color=#ef7070><link=20218601>Double Cross</link></color> allows you to take a peek at 3 of the cards in your opponent’s hand and choose one to copy and then play. This can be particularly effective when your opponent has only 3 cards left, as it will tell you exactly what tools your opponent has left to use against you.
faction_nilfgaard_1_desc_name;Hasonulás
faction_nilfgaard_1_desc_text;Cards with <color=#ef7070><link=assimilate>Hasonulás</link></color> will receive a boost each time you play a card that wasn’t in your starting deck. <color=#ef7070><link=20223900>Artorius Vigo</link></color>, for example, will create a copy of one of the bronze cards in your starting deck and will boost himself and all other <color=#ef7070><link=assimilate>Hasonulás</link></color> cards you control by 1 (unless specified differently) after doing so.
faction_nilfgaard_2_desc_name;Áruló
faction_nilfgaard_2_desc_text;Cards like <color=#ef7070><link=20224800>Duchess’s Informant</link></color> are <color=#ef7070><link=disloyal>Áruló</link></color>, meaning you must play them on your opponent’s side of the board. These cards will also gain a <color=#ef7070><link=spying>Spying</link></color> status once played. <color=#ef7070><link=20224800>Duchess’s Informant</link></color> creates a copy of a bronze enemy card for you to play on your side, and is useful for stealing your opponent’s strategy.
faction_nilfgaard_description;Use whatever means necessary to increase the reach of the Empire.
faction_nilfgaard_name;Nilfgaard
faction_northern_description;The Északi Királyságok boast powerful mages and siege engines that rain fire upon their foes.
faction_northern_name;Északi Királyságok
faction_northernrealms_0_desc_name;Felkelés
faction_northernrealms_0_desc_text;<color=#ef7070><link=20257401>Felkelés</link></color> lets you boost a unit 3 times, allowing you to protect valuable cards. For maximum efficiency, save your charges until you’re ready to deploy the <color=#ef7070><link=20216100>Lyrian Scytheman</link></color>, which will be created once you’ve used up all charges. Deploy this card to a row filled with boosted units to perform a powerful finishing play.
faction_northernrealms_1_desc_name;Inspirált
faction_northernrealms_1_desc_text;Cards like <color=#ef7070><link=20215200>Anna Strenger</link></color> have stronger abilities when <color=#ef7070><link=inspired>Inspirált</link></color>, meaning when they are boosted above their base power, their impact on the battlefield grows. It’s usually wise to prioritize boosting such units to gain the upper hand.
faction_northernrealms_2_desc_name;Formation
faction_northernrealms_2_desc_text;Cards with <color=#ef7070><link=order>Parancs</link></color> can not normally execute their képesség until the turn after they are played. However, those with the <color=#ef7070><link=formation>Formation</link></color> keyword? — like <color=#ef7070><link=20242100>Radovid’s Royal Guards</link></color> — have the option to do so. Play these cards on the melee row to use their order képesség immediately, OR play them on the ranged row to gain one point of boost.
faction_northernrealms_description;Unite your forces and bolster them to overpower any foe.
faction_scoiatael_0_desc_name;Nature’s Gift
faction_scoiatael_0_desc_text;<color=#ef7070><link=20016501>Nature’s Gift</link></color> can be used 3 times to give a unit <color=#ef7070><link=vitality>Vitality</link></color> — a status that boosts them by 1 at the end of your current and next turn. It can be especially effective on <color=#ef7070><link=20267800>Hamadryads</link></color> and can be applied multiple times to the same unit to extend its duration.
faction_scoiatael_1_desc_name;Symbiosis
faction_scoiatael_1_desc_text;Thanks to the <color=#ef7070><link=symbiosis>Symbiosis</link></color> képesség of <color=#ef7070><link=20016500>Nature’s Gift</link></color>, whenever you play a special card with the <color=#ef7070><link=nature>Nature</link></color> category — like <color=#ef7070><link=20226900>Dryad’s Caress</link></color> — you will spawn a 1-power Treant on the board. The power of the <color=#ef7070><link=20268300>Treants</link></color> you create increases by 1 for every unit with <color=#ef7070><link=symbiosis>Symbiosis</link></color> you currently control.
faction_scoiatael_2_desc_name;Hand boosting
faction_scoiatael_2_desc_text;Play cards like  <color=#ef7070><link=20267700>Circle of Life</link></color> early in a round to boost a random Scoia’tael unit in your hand before you play it. With this special card, if you manage to kill the unit you damage, the <color=#ef7070><link=deathblow>Deathblow</link></color> effect will allow you to choose which unit gets boosted.
faction_scoiatael_description;Use the power of nature to grow your army and defend your forests from invaders.

faction_skellige_0_desc_name;Patricidal Fury
faction_skellige_0_desc_text;Use <color=#ef7070><link=20211901>Patricidal Fury</link></color> to unleash <color=#ef7070><link=20218200>Arnjolf the Patricide</link></color>. This not only grants you an 11-point body but also results in 3 damaged sirens on the enemy side, allowing you to gain even more power from cards like <color=#ef7070><link=15210600>Madman Lugos</link></color>. It can also be used to fill up your opponent’s row, preventing them from playing more cards on it.

faction_skellige_2_desc_name;Vérszomj
faction_skellige_2_desc_text;<color=#ef7070><link=20262400>An Craite Raiders</link></color> let you deal 2 damage to a unit of your choice on the turn after it’s played. Its <color=#ef7070><link=bloodthirst>Vérszomj</link></color> condition allows you to deal this damage immediately after playing it via the <color=#ef7070><link=zeal>Hév</link></color> képesség, but only if your opponent has at least 3 damaged units.

journey_1_story_extended_1;Geralt küzdött.\n\nA korábban megivott főzetek még mindig az ereiben keringtek, és kiélesítették az érzékeit. Ám az éjszaka nyirkos levegője mintha beleragadt volna a tüdejébe. Nehézkes lélegzetvételei csapásainak ritmusát is meg-megtörték.\n\nA vaják hevesen káromkodott, miközben próbált a pengéjével utat találni a kreatúra bőréhez annak páncél borította testén, a pikkelylemezek között. Miután végre-valahára célt ért, a sebzett lény visszavonulót fújt: nyomban a víz alá merült. Ormótlan mérete ellenére valahogy mégis sikerült teljesen eltűnnie.\n\nZihálása közepette Geralt újra elkáromkodta magát, aztán tett egy bizonytalan lépést hátrafelé. Majd még egyet, noha a sűrű iszap ragaszkodón tapadt a lábaihoz. Ekkor valami nyálkás, aminek az érintésétől még a hátán is felállt a szőr, csusszant a csizmája szárába. Alig volt érkezése megfordulni, ahogy fekete víztömeg tört fel a háta mögött.\n\nAz ősöreg, talán a mocsárral is egyidős, roppant vippra évek óta vadászott a Gulet környéki ingoványokban. Évek óta öldösött, gyarapodott és erősítette páncéljának mostanra átvághatatlanná lett pikkelyeit. Mígnem végül a város elöljárója úgy döntött, inkább megbíz egy vajákot, hogy az vessen véget a lény ámokfutásának…\n\nEzért nem fizet eleget, gondolta Geralt, és közben elhajolt egy maró savköpet elől. Határozottan nem fizet eleget.\n\n*
journey_1_story_extended_1_new;Geralt küzdött.\n\nA korábban megivott főzetek még mindig az ereiben keringtek, és kiélesítették az érzékeit. Ám az éjszaka nyirkos levegője mintha beleragadt volna a tüdejébe. Nehézkes lélegzetvételei csapásainak ritmusát is meg-megtörték.\n\nA vaják hevesen káromkodott, miközben próbált a pengéjével utat találni a kreatúra bőréhez annak páncél borította testén, a pikkelylemezek között. Miután végre-valahára célt ért, a sebzett lény visszavonulót fújt: nyomban a víz alá merült. Ormótlan mérete ellenére valahogy mégis sikerült teljesen eltűnnie.\n\nZihálása közepette Geralt újra elkáromkodta magát, aztán tett egy bizonytalan lépést hátrafelé. Majd még egyet, noha a sűrű iszap ragaszkodón tapadt a lábaihoz. Ekkor valami nyálkás, aminek az érintésétől még a hátán is felállt a szőr, csusszant a csizmája szárába. Alig volt érkezése megfordulni, ahogy fekete víztömeg tört fel a háta mögött.\n\nAz ősöreg, talán a mocsárral is egyidős, roppant vippra évek óta vadászott a Gulet környéki ingoványokban. Évek óta öldösött, gyarapodott és erősítette páncéljának mostanra átvághatatlanná lett pikkelyeit. Mígnem végül a város elöljárója úgy döntött, inkább megbíz egy vajákot, hogy az vessen véget a lény ámokfutásának…\n\nEzért nem fizet eleget, gondolta Geralt, és közben elhajolt egy maró savköpet elől. Határozottan nem fizet eleget.\n\n*
journey_1_story_extended_10;Temetés lesz.\n\nTemetés, az ám – erről Geralt határozottan meg volt győződve, legfőképpen azután, hogy a piactéren áthaladtában értesült az örömteli hírekről. Egy bizonyos, Kora nevezetű kisasszony és Lettenhove vikomtja között köttetett eljegyzésről máris pletykák keringtek…\n\nUgyanarról a hölgyeményről lehetett szó, vajon, akibe véletlenül botlottak bele az éjszaka folyamán? Aki a becsületén esett szégyenfolt miatt kiabált Kökörcsinnel? A dalnok persze szépen hangzó hazugságokkal állt elő, még arra is ígéretet tett, hogy anyagiakkal kompenzálja a szégyennel együtt élni kénytelen hölgyet. Amikor aztán nem járt sikerrel, előhozakodott egy jól csengő nemesi címmel, ami – feltehetőleg – csak egy újabb volt a hazugságok sorában. Viszont annak hallatán a fiatal Kora tüstént megjuhászodott, rögtön felhagyott a vádaskodással és fenyegetődzéssel, ami szerint nem csak a bátyjaiért, hanem a városi őrség járőreiért is kiáltani szándékozott. Gyenge kis fenyegetés volt, ám ők ketten meglehetős részegek és féleszűek voltak abban a pillanatban. Ezért Kökörcsin a lánnyal tartott, de a biztonság kedvéért a vaják őrizetére hagyta a lantját, és biztosította róla, hogy visszatér, amint a leányzó álomba merül. Geraltnak volt egy olyan érzése, hogy Kora ébredt fel előbb, és adta hírül a dolgot a vásárosoknak, meg ki tudja még kinek. A család már bizonyára készülődött ez előre eltervezett eseményre, és bármibe lefogadta volna, hogy sejtelmük sem volt a tehetős kereskedő lecseréléséről. A vaják úgy vélte, hogy rövidesen fény derül az igazságra az új vőlegény kilétét illetően, a dühödt fivérek pedig nem lesznek restek kátrányt forrósítani, a férjjelölt pedig a sógorai helyett hamarosan a hóhéraival néz majd szemközt.\n\nEgy gyors temetés lesz.\n\n*
journey_1_story_extended_11;Geralt remélte, hogy nem kerül sor semmiféle temetésre, ha segít a poétának kereket oldani. A vajáknak szemernyi kétsége nem volt Kökörcsin házasságkötéstől való megmenekedésének sikerességét illetően. Ezért hát egyenesen a polgármester házához ment abban a reményben, hátha ott találja a – további reményei szerint – szintén cudar mód másnapos poétát az izgatott arájával egyetemben. A ház kapujában azonban rögtön ismerős arcokat látott: a gyülekező násznép között a négy fivért, meg az egész seregletet vezető elöljárót. Úgy tűnt, hogy az ifjú menyasszonynak máris sikerült megbékítenie a bátyjait. Azt, hogy vajon mit ígérhetett ezért nekik a lány cserébe, Geralt nem is akarta kitalálni… Próbálta akkora távolságtartással szemlélni az ügyet, amekkorával csak lehetett. Egy italozással együtt töltött cimborálás még semmiféle kötelezettséget nem rótt rá a költő megmentését illetően, emlékeztette magát a vaják. Az erősen illuminált állapotban tett ígéreteket amúgy sem lehet kötelező érvényűnek tekinteni, ezt ismételgette magának, amint térült-fordult, hogy elinduljon vissza, az istállók irányába. De aztán Geralt eszébe jutott a nyeregtáskájában lapuló lant… Nagyot sóhajtott, és ismét fordult, ezúttal a ház irányába.\n\nA vajáknak esze ágában sem volt a letartóztatását kockáztatni azáltal, hogy verekedésbe kezd Kökörcsin kiszabadítása érdekében, de abból talán nem származhatott baj, ha a közelben várakozik, hátha alkalma nyílik a segítségére sietni. Nemde?\n\nSzerencsétlenségére sem a menyasszony, sem a fivérek nem tágítottak Kökörcsin mellől még egy percre sem. Közben a polgármester a szívélyes házigazda szerepét játszotta: körbevezette a vendégeket a lakodalomnak otthont adó téren, és beavatta őket a helyi szokásokba. Úgy tűnt, mintha fogalma sem lett volna a feszült helyzetről.\n\nGeralt biztonságos távolból követte őket és addig hallgatózott, mígnem egészen nyilvánvalóvá vált számára, hogy a dalnok mikor szándékozik megkísérelni a szökést.\n\n*
journey_1_story_extended_12;Geralt nem táncolt.\n\nVagy, legalábbis, próbált belőle kimaradni, amennyire csak tudott, ugyanis a népes seregleten való átkelés jól időzített ugrásokat és erélyes lökéseket kívánt meg tőle. A vaják a tekintetével újfent Kökörcsint kereste, akit, miután kezdetét vette az ostoba szokásból fakadó rítus, egészen elnyelt a tömeg. A poéta helyett a pillantása egy teljesen elveszettnek tűnő, idősödő kereskedőn akadt meg, aki tanácstalanul álldogált a táncolók között, fogalma nem lévén arról, hogy mi tévő legyen. Csak a démonok voltak a megmondhatói, hogy a lány közölte-e már vele a szándékát, a terveinek változását.\n\nGeralt nyomult egyre előre. A városlakók egyike-másika próbálta ugyan feltartóztatni a lökdösődőt, de nem jártak sok sikerrel. Egyre hangosodott a muzsikaszó, lehetetlenné téve bármiféle beszélgetést a táncpartnerek között. Az őrület ellenére a vajáknak végre sikerült kiszúrnia a tömegben egy feltűnő, kócsagtollal díszített kalpagot. Kevéssé lepte meg, hogy a fejfedő tulajdonosát négy, ismerős kinézetű csirkefogó szorongatta.\n\nMert látta, hogy szorítja az idő, odanyomakodott, és egész testsúlyát beleadva lökte be az első fivért a tömeg közepébe, messze Kökörcsintől. Lesújtott a másodikra, ezzel földre küldve a fickót, aki aztán egyenesen a poéta lábai alá esett. Mialatt a dalnok értelmetlen pörgések és forgások sorozatával kápráztatta el önmagát, a karjánál fogva ragadta meg a harmadikat. A látványos előadásnak azzal vetett végett, hogy nemes egyszerűséggel gáncsot vetett a bajkeverőnek, aki nyomban hanyatt vágódott. A negyedikkel hosszasan küzdött, ami jórészt Kökörcsinnek volt köszönhető. A dalnok, hogy megvezesse ellenfelét, úgy ugrabugrált, mint egy udvari bolond, mielőtt végre elszelelt volna. Az izomagyú már készült a nyomába eredni, de hirtelen egy kiáltás forrása, a húga felé fordult.\n\nEredeti kérője ölelgette-szorongatta a szegény lányt, aki rímfaragó megmentője után kutatva, riadt arccal pásztázta a tömeget. Ekkora azonban a megmentőnek se híre, se hamva nem volt. Mindeközben a vaják, akinek elege lett abból, hogy mások ügyes-bajos dolgaiba csöppent, megállt, megvonta a vállát, aztán elindult vissza, az istállók felé.\n\nAmikor végre odaért és meglátta a teljesen elcsüggedt, földön térdeplő poétát, elmosolyodott magában. Látható volt, hogy drámai összeomlása közepette Kökörcsin észre sem vette, hogy csak a másik irányába kellett volna néznie, és megpillanthatta volna Keszeget, a nyeregtáskában pedig a lantját. Geralt most már tényleg mosolygott. Odalépett a lóhoz, kivette a táskából a hangszert, és rászólt a peches bolondra, hogy kapja össze magát, és fejezze be a szánalmas színjátékot.\n\nKis idő múlva, amikor végre a lova nyergében ült, úton Gulet városkapuja felé, hátranézett, és látta, hogy a trubadúr ott baktat a nyomában.\n\nÚgy tűnt, Kökörcsinnek egyhamar nem állt szándékában tágítani mellőle, és követné őt, akár a világ végére is…\n\nVÉGE
journey_1_story_extended_2;A polgármester arca az undor grimaszába torzult, amikor meglátta az ocsmány trófeát.\n\nEnnek ellenére mégis kíváncsian nézegette az eltátott pofát és próbálta megszámlálni a vippra fogait. Harminc egynéhány után mégis felhagyott vele, és sokatmondó tekintettel méregette Geraltot. A vaják csak megvonta a vállát.\n\nAz elöljáróhoz hasonló hivatalos személyek gyakorta kerestek kifogásokat, hogy faraghassanak az előre kialkudott fizetségből. Mindenesetre nehéz lett volna vitatni az eredményt úgy, hogy közben egy vippra feje hever az ember előtt az asztalon. Ezért hát Gulet elöljárója szó nélkül fizetett.\n\nRáadásul a vaják számára szokatlanul szívélyes invitálásban is része lehetett, amikor a polgármester meglehetősen vonzó képet festve ecsetelte neki a helyi tavaszünnepen való részvétellel járó élvezeteket. Ami szemléletes kép szerint az utcákon ilyenkor mindig csak úgy folyik az alkohol, és a szaftos, porhanyós húsok is alig karnyújtásnyira vannak a söröshordóktól. Továbbá egy ifjú, tehetséges dalnok is fellép a mulatságok minden egyes napján. „Maradj hát, és merülj el az ünnepségünk nyújtotta élvezetekben!”, marasztalta meglepő nyájassággal az elöljáró.\n\nGeralt tekintete egy hosszú pillanatig elidőzött az asztalon heverő, vérben tocsogó fejen, aminek a szaga már elkezdte betölteni a hivatalként is használt helyiséget. És újfent megvonta a vállát.\n\n*
journey_1_story_extended_2_new;A polgármester arca az undor grimaszába torzult, amikor meglátta az ocsmány trófeát.\n\nEnnek ellenére mégis kíváncsian nézegette az eltátott pofát és próbálta megszámlálni a vippra fogait. A vaják csak megvonta a vállát.\n\nAz elöljáróhoz hasonló hivatalos személyek gyakorta kerestek kifogásokat, hogy faraghassanak az előre kialkudott fizetségből. Ezért hát Gulet elöljárója szó nélkül fizetett.\n\nRáadásul a vaják számára szokatlanul szívélyes invitálásban is része lehetett, amikor a polgármester meglehetősen vonzó képet festve ecsetelte neki a helyi tavaszünnepen való részvétellel járó élvezeteket. Továbbá egy ifjú, tehetséges dalnok is fellép a mulatságok minden egyes napján. „Maradj hát, és merülj el az ünnepségünk nyújtotta élvezetekben!”, marasztalta meglepő nyájassággal az elöljáró.\n\nGeralt tekintete egy hosszú pillanatig elidőzött az asztalon heverő, vérben tocsogó fejen, aminek a szaga már elkezdte betölteni a hivatalként is használt helyiséget. És újfent megvonta a vállát.\n\n*
journey_1_story_extended_3;Geraltnak, miután a piactérre ért, nem az volt az első dolga, hogy megkeresse a színpadot. Legelőször is jókedvének megalapozása lebegett a lelki szemei előtt, ezért hát biztosította magának a hozzávalókat: egy butélia vodkát, valamint egy tekintélyes hosszúsággal bíró kolbászfüzért. A testes iparosasszonyság, akitől a finomságokat vette, egyetlen pillantásnál többre nem méltatta.\n\nLáthatólag ő volt az egyedüli kivétel.\n\nAhogy áthaladt az egyre növekvő tömegen, pusmogások ütötték meg a fülét, és láttára az emberek nyomban félrehúzódtak az útjából. Egynémelyek tekintetében félelem ült, mások csak tátott szájjal bámulták a fehér hajú vajákot. Geralt egyikükkel sem törődött – nagy nyugodtan kortyolgatott néha a vodkájából, közben pedig harapott egyet-egyet a szaftos kolbászból.\n\nLantszó hangjai terelték el róla a tömeg figyelmét.\n\nZene szállt a közeli városháza előtt felállított színpad felől, és akárki is játszott a hangszeren, nyilvánvalóan másnapos lehetett, mert az illető színpadi mozgásának ritmusa és a dallam üteme köszönőviszonyban sem voltak egymással. Azonban amint a muzsikus dalba fogott, a hangja egészen kellemesnek bizonyult, és az előadott mű – az A két pici cici balladája –, amellett, hogy meglehetősen kiforratlan és otromba volt, mégis egészen szórakoztatónak bizonyult. Az előadás rövidesen véget ért, és Geralt arra jutott, hogy a kulináris élményei messze felülmúlják a kulturálisakat.\n\nEnnek ellenére az utolsó korty karcos vodka könnyeket csalt a szemébe.\n\n*
journey_1_story_extended_3_new;Geraltnak, miután a piactérre ért, nem az volt az első dolga, hogy megkeresse a színpadot. Legelőször is jókedvének megalapozása lebegett a lelki szemei előtt, ezért hát biztosította magának a hozzávalókat: egy butélia vodkát, valamint egy tekintélyes hosszúsággal bíró kolbászfüzért. A testes iparosasszonyság, akitől a finomságokat vette, egyetlen pillantásnál többre nem méltatta.\n\nLáthatólag ő volt az egyedüli kivétel.\n\nAhogy áthaladt az egyre növekvő tömegen, pusmogások ütötték meg a fülét, és láttára az emberek nyomban félrehúzódtak az útjából. Egynémelyek tekintetében félelem ült, mások csak tátott szájjal bámulták a fehér hajú vajákot.
